name: Spider 1000
description:
* Our solitaire app series reached 4 million downloads! *

The refreshing and exhilarating "Solitaire 1000" series 3rd version.
"Spider 1000" which is easy game in the solitaire is now released!

Let's rid it of all the card which placed like a spider web!

Did you know that solitaire has many type of games?
The rules of Spider 1000 is very simple, so make your feeling good!

[1] We selected deals which are winnable!

[2] Enjoy a lot! Each game include 1000 deals.

[3] Compete with others each stage through the ranking for advanced user!

[4] All deals has example answer for beginner.

[5] Everyone have fun to get clear awards.

[6] Game included 3 type which are 1 suit, 2 suit and 4 suit.

[7] It's free of charge. Let's play now!

* Inquiry
- If you have any questions or report bug, please contact us by email from
information page. We will answer individually.
- And, we will make an effort of our product,
so please give us your feedback on product usage.

PRO Corp.
PRO.APP Solitaire Series
Spider 1000
